content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: DeleteSiteScript path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/cdn/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/scripts/{script_id} content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name scriptid
desc a serverless script id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum delete a serverless script
responses
title: 25_Serverless Scripting_DeleteSiteScript_148.json
